entities.name: diggory
entities.description: Diggory is a person who is able to cast spells and disappear into darkness. He is described as marching across the clearing with his wand raised.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a person who watches Diggory vanish with her hands over her mouth.

entities.name: mr crouch
entities.description: Mr. Crouch is a person who sounds highly disbelieving when he hears that someone has been found unconscious.

entities.name: winky
entities.description: Winky is a person who is described as being tiny and limp, and is recognized by Harry due to the tea towel she is wrapped in.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who recognizes Winky due to the tea towel she is wrapped in.

relationships.description: Hermione watched Diggory vanish into darkness.
Mr. Crouch spoke to Mr. Diggory, asking who the person was that had been found unconscious.
Diggory carried Winky in his arms.
Harry recognized Winky due to the tea towel she was wrapped in.
